name: TIME_PASSIVE_EXTEND
descrip_cn: 每次被动反射延续状态时长（秒）
descrip_en: State duration extension per passive reflection (seconds)

name: TIME_ACTIVE_EXTEND
descrip_cn: 每次主动反射延续状态时长（秒）
descrip_en: State duration extension per active reflection (seconds)

name: TIME_SWING_ACTIVE
descrip_cn: 挥刀后主动反射状态持续时长（秒）
descrip_en: Active reflection state duration after a melee swing (seconds)

name: CHANCE_BACK_ACTIVE
descrip_cn: 主动反射回弹子弹概率
descrip_en: Chance for active reflection to return bullet to shooter

name: CHANCE_BACK_PASSIVE
descrip_cn: 被动反射回弹子弹概率
descrip_en: Chance for passive reflection to return bullet to shooter

name: PASSIVE_STAMINA_COST
descrip_cn: 被动反射体力消耗率（基于子弹伤害）
descrip_en: Passive reflection stamina cost rate (based on bullet damage)

name: DAMAGE_MULT_ACTIVE
descrip_cn: 主动反射后子弹伤害乘数
descrip_en: Reflected bullet damage multiplier after active reflection

name: DAMAGE_MULT_PASSIVE
descrip_cn: 被动反射后子弹伤害乘数
descrip_en: Reflected bullet damage multiplier after passive reflection

name: DISTANCE_MULT_ACTIVE
descrip_cn: 主动反射后子弹射程乘数
descrip_en: Reflected bullet range multiplier after active reflection

name: DISTANCE_MULT_PASSIVE
descrip_cn: 被动反射后子弹射程乘数
descrip_en: Reflected bullet range multiplier after passive reflection

name: ACTIVE_CRITICAL
descrip_cn: 主动反射子弹是否暴击
descrip_en: Whether actively reflected bullets are critical hits

name: ACTIVE_EXPLOSION
descrip_cn: 主动反射子弹是否爆炸

name: ACTIVE_EXPLOSION_DAMAGE_FACTOR
descrip_cn: 主动反射爆炸额外伤害乘数（基于反射后子弹伤害）
descrip_en: Active reflection explosion extra damage multiplier (based on reflected bullet damage)
